member.name: M:MediaAPI.Controllers.MediaController.GetMdbListAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Obtain a list from MDBList with TMDB poster URLs.

member.name: M:MediaAPI.Controllers.MediaController.GetTmdbPosterAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
